title: E-portfolio design for competency-based language education

context.additional_context: Non-synchronous learning environments using digital devices, reflecting the need for job integration among adult learners

learning_goals: Achieve language competencies required in real work environments with a performance accuracy of 80% or higher.
Systematically collect and organize 15 or more pieces of evidence in an e-portfolio.
Successfully complete three or more certification tasks under variable assessment conditions.
Write a self-reflection report based on five or more feedbacks through peer evaluation.
Develop an action plan to apply competencies acquired during the learning process to professional settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
